msg: Add a createStandaloneNode method which creates a Node running a composite outside of any domain

msg: Update all the install methods to return the uri of the installed contribution which simplifies the use of default URIs

msg: Add data api as a test dependency so it can be used by one of the tests

msg: CAMEL-2971: Added option synchronous to endpoints to control if async processing can be used by producers.
